string.name: var_onboarding_content_1
string.big:
TimesReader will not function correctly if you don't have an online NYT subscription. 

I created this free application to save my life and those of others. I was reading the New York Times on my phone every morning while speeding down the highway to work. Eventually it occurred to me that this was not a great idea. I assumed there was an app that would read me the news but I couldn't find one I liked, so I wrote my own. This is my first mobile project so I apologize for the rough edges. 

If you have any concerns or comments, please feel free to contact me at timesreader@gmail.com. Just keep in mind that this app is completely free and I have a day job, so I may not be able to get back to you right away.

string.name: var_onboarding_content_2
string.big:
Swipe left and right to browse articles 


Back and forward buttons can also be used to browse 


Swipe down from top to refresh articles or return to first article 


Tap image to open article in browser or official NYT app (if installed) 


Next article will play automatically when current one finishes 


If next article doesn't play right away, wake up your phone (press wake button)
